#summary Bot commands
#labels Featured

= Bot owner commands =

These commands are available for owner from any bot's jid:

<li>{{{sh <command> - execute shell command}}}
<li>{{{exec <command> - execute python code}}}
<li>{{{update - update bot from svn repository}}}
<li>{{{quit - shutdown bot}}}
<li>{{{restart - restart bot}}}
<li>{{{stats - show some statistic}}}
<li>{{{help - about me}}}

= Translate jid's =

No specific commands.

= Feeds jid =

<li>{{{show - show feeds for current jid}}}
<li>{{{clear - remove all feeds}}}
<li>{{{add url time mode - add feed where:}}}
{{{
url - url of feed with or without "http://"
time - time between feed check. f.e: 20m or 2h
mode - one of three modes:
 - head - only feed title
 - body - obly fedd body
 - full - title and body
allowed two keys:
-url - show url of feed
-headline - send message as headline
f.e: add bash.org.ru/rss 1h full-url-headline
}}}
<li>{{{del url - remove feed}}}
<li>{{{get url number_of_feeds mode - get feeds}}}
sintax like in "add" command
<li>{{{new url number_of_feeds mode - get only new feeds}}}
sintax like in "add" command
